report_metadata.assessment_scope: Data synchronization, calculation verification, Week 13 analysis

issues_resolved: Added 189 missing Weeks 1-4 games to starter pack migrated data
Added 15 missing Week 12 games to starter pack
Fixed data synchronization between starter pack and training data
Created backup of original starter pack data

issues_fixed: Added missing home_win and away_win columns to training data
Updated verification script to allow Week 16 games

key_insights.insight: 16 games have significant playoff implications, with 0 potential elimination games
39 games show high upset potential - consider against-the-spread implications

data_synchronization: Added 189 missing Weeks 1-4 games to starter pack migrated data
Added 15 missing Week 12 games to starter pack
Fixed data synchronization between starter pack and training data
Created backup of original starter pack data
calculation_verification: Added missing home_win and away_win columns to training data
Updated verification script to allow Week 16 games
week13_predictions: Added missing predicted_home_score and predicted_away_score columns
Generated score estimates from win probabilities
analysis_enhancement: Created comprehensive Week 13 analysis with 64 games
Identified 39 games with high upset potential

recommendations.details: Set up automated process to sync new CFBD data each week to prevent synchronization gaps

recommendations.action: Retrain models with complete Weeks 1-12 data
recommendations.details: Now that data is synchronized, retrain models using complete dataset for improved accuracy
Set up scheduled verification to catch calculation issues before they affect predictions
Focus on 39 games identified with high upset potential for betting and analysis opportunities
Document the fixes and improvements made for future reference and team onboarding
